title: Document Display
subtitle: Share important documents like whitepapers, articles, instructions, and other text or visual-heavy materials directly on your fan page.
bells_whistles: Application flexibility allows you to embed a wide range of document types. Perfect for whitepapers, presentations, menus, or any other document form supported by Scribd.

features.title: Customizable Header
features.description: An optional customizable and linkable header, turned on/off via the Content Management Panel, allows for important brand impressions.

features.title: Get More Fans
features.description: Our fan gate feature entices new viewers to "Like" your Page before they can interact with your apps. This can explosively drive up your fan count, giving you a larger audience to engage with in the future.

features.title: Commenting is Good
features.description: Social commenting box encourages the chatter around your content, driving additional awareness and traffic to the Page.

features.title: Share Management
features.description: Every North Social app includes the ability to customize the image and messaging that gets posted to a user's wall when they share your Page.
